help.hierarchyExplanation: Hierarchy allows organizing categories in a tree structure. Disciplines (cardiology, radiology) contain specific equipment.
help.categoryTypes: There are two main types: medical disciplines and equipment. Disciplines group multiple equipment items.
help.navigationTips: Use arrows to expand/collapse subcategories. Multiple selection enables bulk actions.

quickStart.title: Quick Start Guide
quickStart.description: Learn to efficiently manage your medical categories

step1.title: Create Main Disciplines
step1.description: Start by creating the main medical disciplines of your facility
step1.tip1: Create main disciplines first (Cardiology, Radiology, etc.)
step1.tip2: Use short and clear names for easy navigation
step1.tip3: Display order can be adjusted with the 'Sort Order' field

step2.title: Organize Subcategories
step2.description: Structure your equipment into logical subcategories
step2.tip1: Create subcategories for each type of equipment
step2.tip2: Use a maximum of 3 levels of hierarchy to stay readable

step3.title: Optimize and Maintain
step3.description: Optimize SEO and maintain your structure
step3.tip1: Add SEO descriptions to improve visibility
step3.tip2: Regularly review organization based on needs

hero.title: Leading Medical Equipment Provider in Morocco
hero.description: Since our establishment, KITMED has been dedicated to importing, distributing, installing and maintaining high-performance medical equipment and consumables, meeting the needs of both public and private sector clients.

overview.title: Our Story
overview.description1: KITMED is a Moroccan company specialized in the import, distribution, installation, and maintenance of medical equipment and consumables for both public and private sectors.
overview.description2: Located at 20, rue Lalande, in Casablanca's hospital district, our company has established itself as a trusted partner for healthcare facilities throughout the kingdom and is expanding towards North African markets.

established.title: Established in Morocco
established.description: Based in Casablanca's hospital district since our founding

expertise.title: Complete Medical Solutions
expertise.description: Import, distribution, installation, and professional maintenance

reach.title: North African Expansion
reach.description: Serving Morocco and expanding strategically into North Africa

mission.sectionDescription: Supporting the development of the medical sector with high-performance equipment
mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To support the development of the medical sector by providing high-performance medical equipment and consumables, adapted to the needs of each client in both public and private sectors.
points: Import, distribute and install cutting-edge medical equipment
Ensure professional maintenance and after-sales service
Guarantee professional and quality materials through our global partnerships
Accompany our clients throughout the process for continuous satisfaction

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Maintain our strong position as a major player in the local market and continue our growth process by expanding towards the North African region.
points: Consolidate our leadership in the Moroccan market
Develop partnerships with renowned global brands
Stay alert to new technological developments in medical equipment
